Contractors must report project activities, but for visibility purposes and completeness of time journals PM/RM may ask contractors to report also non-project activities (NPA) with relevant description.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Time Journal can be filled out at any time convenient but no later than 9:00 AM (GMT) of the first working day of the following week (usually Monday) or the first working day of the following month – whichever is earlier.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As we approach the Cutover
